formatted_address: Bowyer Block level 1, Singapore General Hospital, Singapore 168753
name: Orchid Thai

reviews.text:
This place specializes in Singaporean cuisine and offers a serene dining experience.

Upon arrival, I was impressed by the peaceful atmosphere and the soothing sound of the nearby waterfall. The place was bustling with activity, primarily catering to take-away customers. However, there were also a few customers enjoying their meals in the comfortable seating area.

While the overall quality was satisfactory, there were a few minor drawbacks. The bread served with the meals was slightly hard to bite into, which affected the overall enjoyment of the dishes.

The most horrible phad thai i ever tasted! It is so horrible that i don't even know how to describe. Yet you call your orchid thai? I mean,  please try it yourself or any thai, i am very sure, you'll get very negative feedback. I have to literally swallow it in order not to waste food. Please don't sell this if you cannot be authentic or even up to the basic standard. Yet it is not cheap too. Very very and extremely disappointing.

The staff especially male cashier. Unfriendly, rude and not happy with his work i guess. Literally threw the packet lunch in the plastic bag and unhappily slam the food in the table! I mean harlow i am paying customer ok? Do i deserve this? What did i do to you? If you have a bad morning then pls take leave or mc. Don't come to work with an attitude. You only spoil ppl mood. Ir your boss never pay you enough? Then please take it up with your boss and not the customers!

Thai food kiosk at SNEC. Serving local delights like meesiam , nasi lemak , kueh, breads, sandwiches ü•™ and cakes . Lunch time selling hot Thai meal
The coffee ‚òïÔ∏è I ordered was diluted, but I like the ambience around, next to a water fountain and just pay üí∞ $1.30. Haha it‚Äôs a steal .
Will return for the Thai meal ü•ò
Ordered kaya butter toast but there's hardly any kaya inside.Bread is soggy and burnt. Auntie who prepared just threw the bread into the paper bag. Very disappointed, no pride at all.

Found this small cafe inside Singapore National Eye center.. very cozy place with open air space, with the sun light throughout this small area of open space. Good environment with the water flow down sound at another side of the wall. Can see the cloud on top of this cafe... the food is just a very normal local food plus some Thai food like Tom Yam soup and mango sticky rice. I having a Teh siew dai And Mee rebus is just ok normal. But enjoy the environment with this open space cafe!!!

vicinity: Bowyer Block level 1, Singapore General Hospital
